data.title: Gail O'Grady
data.text:
Another Woman's Husband VHS

After being witness to her brothers traumatic drowning death Laurel decides 25 years down the road that she is going to get over her fear of the water by taking swimming lessons. Susan is the swimming instructor Laurel goes to for help and as time passes the two women form a close friendship that reaches beyond just teacher/student. Unfortunately their friendship is put to the test after they come to realize that they're in a relationship with the same man! This is based on a true story.

Lip Service DVD

Roger Deacon (Peter Outerbridge may be on his last legs in the music business but he still knows star power when he sees it. Sunni (Kari Wuhrer) blinds him with her stage presence and sexy appearance but she doesn't have the voice to carry over the songs Deacon intended to produce for her. Good fortune comes his way in the vocal chords of a housewife (Gail O'Grady) who offers to Mili Vanili Sunni's album. When the album becomes a hit the dubbing of Sunni's album becomes harder to hide from both the news media and the fans.
